para_sentences.para_0: Please thoroughly review the syllabus from the Course Syllabus Page before starting the course. The syllabus contains the Course Schedule of activities and assessments. Here you will also find the Course Summary which will help keep you up to date on assignments and assessments.
para_sentences.para_1: You can also click the Syllabus link in the course navigation menu at any time to go to the Course Syllabus Page.
